Thorbis Solutions

Platform building blocks for modern trades businesses

Each page below is a pSEO-ready deep dive that matches the intent of operators evaluating ServiceTitan, Housecall Pro, and legacy toolchains. Choose your path or explore them all.

Join WaitlistView Pricing

Automation & AI

Book every opportunity and run lifecycle campaigns without adding headcount.

Browse all features
AI Assistant24/7 intake

Call Handling • Smart Triage • CRM Automation

Let an AI dispatcher capture every opportunity
Thorbis AI Assistant blends natural language processing with your pricebook, technician roster, and schedule commitments to keep the board full without adding headcount.
  • •Answered 24/7 with brand voice: Custom prompts mirror your greeting, service areas, and etiquette so homeowners feel like they’re speaking with your in-house coordinator.
  • •Real-time booking & capacity checks: AI reviews technician availability, travel buffers, and job requirements to suggest the right appointment window without double-booking.
Explore AI AssistantJoin Waitlist
Marketing AutomationLifecycle journeys

Campaign Builder • Lifecycle Journeys • ROI Analytics

Run campaigns that fill the board automatically
Trigger intelligent campaigns using customer behavior, equipment age, and plan renewals so every contact receives the right message at the right time.
  • •Lifecycle journeys: Prebuilt flows for new customers, inactive accounts, warranty follow-ups, and plan renewals keep your pipeline warm.
  • •Multichannel campaigns: Launch coordinated email, SMS, and postcard campaigns that reference dynamic customer data fields.
Explore Marketing AutomationJoin Waitlist

Operations Control

Dispatch, CRM, and mobile tools that keep office and field teams perfectly in sync.

Browse all features
Scheduling & DispatchSmart board

Drag-and-Drop Board • Skill Routing • Real-Time Visibility

Keep the board balanced while technicians stay on time
See every crew, truck, and commitment on one responsive board. Adjust on the fly with travel times and skill requirements built in.
  • •Skill-aware scheduling: Tag technicians by certifications, equipment expertise, and shift availability. Thorbis highlights best-fit slots instantly.
  • •Live technician map: Track en route, onsite, and completed statuses. Automatically adjust ETAs and notify customers.
Explore Scheduling & DispatchJoin Waitlist
Mobile Field AppOffline

Offline-ready • Guided Workflows • Upsell Tools

Equip technicians with everything they need on-site
Deliver a digital job folder with workflows, parts availability, and payment collection to turn every visit into a five-star experience.
  • •Offline workflows: Download jobs, checklists, and asset history before arriving. Sync automatically once connected.
  • •Visual documentation: Capture photos, videos, and notes that flow directly into job history and customer portals.
Explore Mobile Field AppJoin Waitlist
CRM & SalesAccount insights

Customer Profiles • Activity Timeline • Smart Segments

Give every dispatcher the full customer story
Replace fragmented spreadsheets with a CRM designed for high-volume service operations. Track households, properties, and commercial accounts in one workspace.
  • •360° customer profiles: View service agreements, installed equipment, open estimates, and payment standing without leaving the record.
  • •Timeline of every interaction: Auto-log calls, SMS, emails, and portal activity so your team can pick up any conversation with context.
Explore CRM & SalesJoin Waitlist

Revenue & Finance

Invoice faster, sync with accounting, and protect cash flow in one workspace.

Browse all features
Invoicing & Payments0% processing

Progress Billing • Payment Plans • Automated Reminders

Collect revenue faster with frictionless invoicing
Create professional invoices onsite or in the office, support progress billing, and let customers pay the way they prefer.
  • •Instant invoice creation: Pull parts, labor, and discounts directly from jobs. Generate invoices with one click.
  • •Flexible payment options: Accept ACH, credit card, stored payment methods, and subscription billing with autopay.
Explore Invoicing & PaymentsJoin Waitlist
QuickBooks SyncTwo-way data

Two-Way Sync • Job Costing • Financial Accuracy

Keep operations and accounting perfectly in sync
Empower your finance team with accurate, timely data while letting operations run in Thorbis without double entry.
  • •Two-way data sync: Customers, invoices, payments, vendors, and items stay aligned between Thorbis and QuickBooks in minutes.
  • •Job costing visibility: Push labor, materials, and expenses into QuickBooks with job references for accurate profitability.
Explore QuickBooks SyncJoin Waitlist

Customer Experience

Give homeowners and commercial clients a premium digital journey from booking to payment.

Browse all features
Customer PortalSelf-service

Self-Service • Payments • Real-Time Updates

Provide a modern portal customers actually use
Deliver a white-glove experience without additional staff. Customers log in from any device to view history, upcoming visits, and documents.
  • •Real-time job tracking: Share technician ETAs, status updates, and photos as soon as teams are en route or onsite.
  • •Digital approvals: Capture e-signatures on estimates, change orders, and service agreements without chasing paperwork.
Explore Customer PortalJoin Waitlist
Online BookingInstant scheduling

Self-Service Scheduling • Smart Capacity • Instant Confirmation

Turn website visitors into scheduled jobs 24/7
Thorbis online booking brings the convenience of consumer apps to your service company—safely respecting technician capacity and travel buffers.
  • •Real-time availability: Expose only the slots that work with technician skills, drive time, and existing commitments.
  • •Customizable intake forms: Capture service type, equipment details, urgency, and photos so techs arrive prepared.
Explore Online BookingJoin Waitlist

Switch Programs

Moving from ServiceTitan or Housecall Pro?

Our white-glove team migrates data, recreates automations, and enables Dispatch AI in under 24 hours. Keep your workflows, drop the bloat.
